title: Ranking Problems
body: I like to play ranked but ive lost all of my 13 games. I mean i go well start of game and then i go bad and team blames me i mean ive had the game for only a matter of months. Anyway of being able to get wins or get better cause i go pretty well in Blind Pick.

replies.body: Keep practicing. Also watching streams or youtube videos of higher level people playing can be pretty helpful, theres a lot of good ones out there.
Keep playing and mute your teammates, you'll end up where you belong and then you will start to get better.
